about.details:
Incorporated in 2012, CapitalNumbers Infotech Limited provides digital consulting and IT engineering services, offering complete software development solutions to businesses and startups globally.

The company offers a range of services in technological advancement, including Digital Engineering, Data Analytics, AI/ML, Cloud Engineering, UI/UX Design, and advanced technologies like Blockchain and AR/VR.

Business Model:

  • Project-Based Development: The company specializes in delivering tailored solutions to meet clients' defined goals through a project-based development approach.
  • Time & Material (T& M): The company follows a structured process: discovery, staffing, engineering, and release, ensuring tailored, scalable, and seamless solutions.

The Company has a diverse customer base, serving over 1,000 clients worldwide. As of September 30, 2024, the company had over 250 active clients.

Services offers:

  • Custom Software Development: The company offers bespoke software solutions, enterprise systems, and automation tools to optimize business operations, efficiency, and scalability.
  • Web Development: The company creates dynamic websites, customized e-commerce platforms, and user-friendly CMS solutions to enhance online experiences and management.
  • Mobile App Development: The company offers iOS/Android app development, cross-platform solutions, and ongoing maintenance to ensure optimal performance and user engagement.
  • Quality Assurance (QA): The company offers automated and manual testing to ensure reliable, high-quality software, identifying and addressing issues efficiently.

As of September 30, 2024, the company has 447 employees.

Competitive Strength:

  • Customer Satisfaction and revenues from Long-standing Customer relationships
  • Scalable business model with multiple drivers of steady growth
  • Experienced Promoter and Management Expertise
  • Diversified business across several industrial verticals

faqs.question: What is the CapitalNumbers Infotech IPO?
faqs.answer:
CapitalNumbers Infotech IPO is a SME IPO of 6440000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹169.37 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹263 per share. The minimum order quantity is 400.

The IPO opens on January 20, 2025, and closes on January 22, 2025.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in CapitalNumbers Infotech IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in CapitalNumbers Infotech IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in CapitalNumbers Infotech IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in CapitalNumbers Infotech IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'CapitalNumbers Infotech IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When CapitalNumbers Infotech IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The CapitalNumbers Infotech IPO opens on January 20, 2025 and closes on January 22, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of CapitalNumbers Infotech IPO?
faqs.answer: CapitalNumbers Infotech IPO lot size is 400, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,05,200.

faqs.question: How to apply for CapitalNumbers Infotech IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in CapitalNumbers Infotech IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is CapitalNumbers Infotech IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for CapitalNumbers Infotech IPO will be done on Thursday, January 23, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, January 24, 2025. Check the CapitalNumbers Infotech IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is CapitalNumbers Infotech IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The CapitalNumbers Infotech IPO listing date is on Monday, January 27, 2025.
